description.original: Typewriter-style scrolling which keeps the view centered in the editor.
description.translation: Typewriter-style scrolling which keeps the view centered in the editor.

dict..setDesc(\"Turns typewriter scrolling on: .setDesc("Turns typewriter scrolling on or off globally")
dict..setDesc(\"Positions the typewriter text: .setDesc("Positions the typewriter text at the specified percentage of the screen")
dict..setDesc(\"Darkens non-active lines in t: .setDesc("Darkens non-active lines in the editor so you can focus on what you're typing")
dict..setDesc(\"The opacity of unfocused line: .setDesc("The opacity of unfocused lines in zen mode")
